entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3 except minus 1 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3 except minus 1 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Monday 20 March 2023
